# Sudoku App - Full Stack Development Plan

## Project Overview
Building a complete full-stack Sudoku application with React frontend and Node.js Express backend.

## Features Required
- [x] Play sudoku puzzles with multiple difficulty levels
- [x] Daily sudoku challenge with streak tracking
- [x] Puzzle history
- [x] User authentication
- [x] Timer, hints, undo/redo
- [x] Puzzle validation
- [x] Leaderboard
- [x] Statistics dashboard
- [x] Save/resume games
- [x] Recursive backtracking algorithm
- [x] MongoDB for data persistence
- [x] JWT authentication
- [x] RESTful API
- [x] Responsive design
